mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_username, u.user_password, u.user_name, u.user_sex, u.user_age, u.user_department, u.user_leader, u.user_time_left, d.department_id "department.department_id", d.department_name "department.department_name", d.department_parent "department.department_parent" from user u inner join department d on u.user_department = d.department_id where u.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_username, u.user_password, u.user_name, u.user_sex, u.user_age, u.user_department, u.user_leader, u.user_time_left, d.department_id "department.department_id", d.department_name "department.department_name", d.department_parent "department.department_parent" from user u inner join department d on u.user_department = d.department_id order by u.user_id DESC limit #{offset}, #{limit};
mapper.insert: insert into user( user_id, user_username, user_password, user_name, user_sex, user_age, user_department, user_leader, user_time_left ) values ( #{user.userId}, #{user.userUsername}, #{user.userPassword}, #{user.userName}, #{user.userSex}, #{user.userAge}, #{user.userDepartment}, #{user.userLeader}, #{user.userTimeLeft} );
mapper.update: update user set user_username = #{user.userUsername}, user_password = #{user.userPassword}, user_name = #{user.userName}, user_sex = #{user.userSex}, user_age = #{user.userAge}, user_department = #{user.userDepartment}, user_leader = #{user.userLeader}, user_time_left = #{user.userTimeLeft} where user_id = #{user.userId}
